Have 3 Wats, 1 Mosque, and 1 Fire Temple in 1150 AD

Control or Vassalize Korea, Song, and Jurchen
Control or Vassalize Korea, Song, and Jurchen

It's the year 901 AD. Abaoji has risen as head of the Yila tribe, the most powerful of all the Khitans to extablish the Liao Dynasty! The land of the steppes and northern forests is vast, but the aging dynasty of China has opened up new opprotunities as well. You must choose where to expand knowing that far flung vassals may one day rise against you.
